glsa.title: Adobe Reader: Arbitrary Code Execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Adobe Reader could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.

background.p: Adobe Reader is a closed-source PDF reader.

description.p: An unspecified vulnerability exists in Adobe Reader.

impact.p: An attacker could execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Adobe Reader users should upgrade to the latest version:
